AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hireling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] offer their services for a price.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gladiator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a former gladiator, now offering their services to whoever pays highest and most reliably.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bruiser
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] keeps busy as a bruiser for hire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: trade assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a assistant of the clan leader.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: trade clerk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] works as a clerk for one of the smaller clans.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the major traders of the free standing clans.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clanrat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Just as the countless millions like [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_nameDef] took up arms to become a clan rat serving under one of thousands of clans scattered throughout the underground burrows, strongholds, and bursting cavern-cities that make up the whole of the Under-Empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: skaar rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Clan Skaar is famous for it's extensive mining operations, supplying greater clans with raw warpstone for profit and personal gain. [PAWN_nameDef] gained plenty of experience working for the clan, intimately familiar with the fineries of both mining and haggling.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: skaul rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Almost the entirety of Clan Skaul is full of hedonists and addicts like [PAWN_nameDef], as the clan's main export is various warpstone narcotics, sold to both Skaven and man-things alike. Whether it's for potential profits or a potential high, [PAWN_nameDef] sees more value in drugs than anything else.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: river rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked extensively with Clan Sleekit, navigators of the underground rivers and seas. [PAWN_nameDef] knows all too well the benefit of naval trade, along with the terrible secrets and horrors of the sunless world below.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scavenger rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of Clan Carrion, greatest scavengers in all of Skavendom. To [PAWN_nameDef], nothing is wasted. Anything truly unusuable can be sold, after all.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gritus rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Clan Gritus is among one of the few Skaven clans to engage in pit-fighting bloodsports, using them to deal with surplus population and train warriors and captives alike for battle. [PAWN_nameDef] survived such games, their savagery and cunning earning their freedom, and a measure of power for a time.
